doc.title: 'Tot ziens!'
doc.plot: 'Tot Ziens!' (We'll meet Again!') is a film about saying goodbye and letting go. It is the story of Anna a twelve year old girl who is incurable ill. She lies and stays in bed. This film gives us the opportunity to be witness in the first line of the last conversation between Anna and Mom. In this talk Anna asks Mom's agreement to say goodbye to live and to fly away into oblivion.
